title: recipes_Eaton's_Easy_Pulled_Pork
text:
Title: Eaton's Easy Pulled Pork.
.
Description: This tender pork sandwich filling is sweet and tangy. A slow cooker makes cooking this family favorite a breeze..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 onion, thinly sliced.
- 4.5 pounds bone-in pork loin end roast.
- salt and ground black pepper to taste.
- 0.75 cup cider vinegar.
- 0.25 cup water.
- 0.5 (18 ounce) bottle hickory brown sugar barbeque sauce.
- 3 tablespoons brown sugar, or to taste.
.
Instructions:.
- Arrange onion slices in the bottom of a slow cooker. Season pork with salt and pepper and place over onion. Add vinegar and water..
- Cook pork on Low for 8 hours. Transfer pork to a platter and shred with two forks. Remove and discard about half the pork juices from slow cooker and stir in shredded pork, barbeque sauce, and brown sugar..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 270 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 14 g.
cholesterolContent: 71 mg.
fiberContent: 0 g.
proteinContent: 24 g.
saturatedFatContent: 5 g.
sodiumContent: 341 mg.
sugarContent: 11 g.
fatContent: 12 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 10 servings.
